wikipedia_page.main: Matt O'Mahoney (19 January 1913 – 1992) was an Irish footballer who played for, among others, Bristol Rovers and Ipswich Town. O'Mahoney was a dual international and played for both Ireland teams – the FAI XI and the IFA XI.

response: *19 January – Matt O'Mahoney, international soccer player (died 1992).
* Matt O'Mahoney – Both an Irish IFA and Irish FAI international.
